attributes.action: Support the domestic economy by making each citizen a sterling millionaire using treasury assets
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Placing this share of the treasury assets in the hands of some 61 million citizens will result in each person reacting - uniquely - to solve their most pressing needs when faced with an economic meltdown.
The USA experiment will quickly fail and Britain must have a Plan B.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
